BitField.name: TX_EMPTY_CTRL
BitField.description: This bit controls the generation of the TX_EMPTY interrupt

BitField.name: IC_SLAVE_DISABLE
BitField.description: This bit controls whether I2C has its slave diabled

BitField.name: IC_RESTART_EN
BitField.description: Determines whether RESTART comdtions may be sent when acting as a master

BitField.name: IC_10BITADDR_MASTER
BitField.description: Address mode when acting as a master

BitField.name: SPEED
BitField.description: These bits control at which speed the DW_apb_i2c operates

BitField.name: MASTER_MODE
BitField.description: This bit controls whether the DW_apb_i2c master is enabled

BitField.name: SPECIAL
BitField.description: This bit indicates whether software performs a General Call or START BYTE conmmend

BitField.name: IC_TAR
BitField.description: This is the target address for any master transaction

BitField.name: IC_SAR
BitField.description: The IC_SAR holds the slave address when the i2c is operation as a slave

BitField.name: IC_HS_MAR
BitField.description: This bit field holds the value of the I2C HS mode master mode

BitField.name: CMD
BitField.description: This bit controls whether a read or a write is perormed

BitField.name: DAT
BitField.description: This register contains the data to be transimitted or received on the i2c bus.

BitField.name: IC_SS_SCL_HCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock high period count for standard speed

BitField.name: IC_SS_SCL_LCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock low period count for standard speed

BitField.name: IC_FS_SCL_HCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock high_period count for standard speed

BitField.name: IC_FS_SCL_LCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock low period count for standard speed

BitField.name: IC_HS_SCL_HCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock high_period count for standard speed

BitField.name: IC_HS_SCL_LCNT
BitField.description: This register sets the SCL clock low period count for standard speed

BitField.name: ACTIVITY
BitField.description: This bit captures DW_spb_i2c acticity and stays set until it is cleared

BitField.name: CLR_INTR
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the combined interrupt

BitField.name: CLR_RX_UNDER
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 0)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_RX_OVER
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 1)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_TX_OVER
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 3)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_RD_REQ
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 5)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_TX_ABRT
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 6)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_RX_DONE
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the RX_UNDER interrupt(bit 7)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_ACTIVITY
BitField.description: Reading this register clears the ACTIVITY interrupt if the I2C is not active anymore

BitField.name: CLR_STOP_DET
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the STOP_DET interrupt(bit 9)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_START_DET
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the START_DET interrupt(bit 10)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: CLR_GEN_CALL
BitField.description: Read this register to clear the GEN_CALL interrupt(bit 11)of the IC_RAW_INTR_STAT register

BitField.name: TXFLR
BitField.description: Transmit FIFO level.Contains the number of valid data entires in the transmit FIFO

BitField.name: RXFLR
BitField.description: Receive FIFO level. Contains the number of valid data entires in the receive FIFO

BitField.name: IC_SDA_RX_HOLD
BitField.description: Sets the required SDA hold time in units of ic_clk period

BitField.name: IC_SDA_TX_HOLD
BitField.description: Sets the required SDA hold time in units of ic_clk period

BitField.name: RXFULL_INTF
BitField.description: RX FIFO full interrupt flag bit

BitField.name: RXMATCH_INTF
BitField.description: Receive data match the RXDNR number

BitField.name: RXOERR_INTF
BitField.description: Receive overrun error interrupt flag bit

BitField.name: RX_INTF
BitField.description: Receive data available interrupt flag bit

BitField.name: TX_INTF
BitField.description: Transmit FIFO avialable interrupt flag bit

BitField.name: RXFULL_IEN
BitField.description: Receive FIFO full interrupt enable bit

BitField.name: RXMATCH_IEN
BitField.description: Receive data complete interrupt enable bit

BitField.name: UNDERRUN_IEN
BitField.description: Transmitter underrun interrupt enable bit(SPI slave mode only)

BitField.name: TX_IEN
BitField.description: Transmit FIFO empty interrupt enable bit

BitField.name: RXFULL_ICLR
BitField.description: Receiver buffer full interrupt clear bit

BitField.name: UNDERRUN_ICLR
BitField.description: Transmitter underrun interrupt clear bit(SPI slave mode only)

BitField.name: TX_ICLR
BitField.description: Transmitter FIFO empty interrupt clear bit

BitField.name: DATA_SEL
BitField.description: Valid byte or double-word data select signal

BitField.name: NSS_SEL
BitField.description: NSS select signal that from software and hardware

BitField.name: SPBRG
BitField.description: SPI baud rate control register for baud rate

BitField.name: RXDNR
BitField.description: The register is used to hold a count of to be received bytes in next receive process

BitField.name: NSS
BitField.description: Chip select output signal in Master mode

RegisterGroup.name: USB
RegisterGroup.description: Universal serial bus full-speed device interface

BitField.name: RESET
BitField.description: Reset EP and FIFO in USB controller

BitField.name: DBG_I2C2_SMBUS_TIMEOUT
BitField.description: SMBUS timeout mode stopped when Core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_I2C1_SMBUS_TIMEOUT
BitField.description: SMBUS timeout mode stopped when Core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_CAN_STOP
BitField.description: Debug CAN stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_TIMx_STOP
BitField.description: TIMx counter stopped when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_WWDG_STOP
BitField.description: Debug window watchdog when core is halted

BitField.name: DBG_IWDG_STOP
BitField.description: Debug independent watchdog stopped when core is stopped

BitField.name: ERRIE
BitField.description: Synchronization or trimming error interrupt enable

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

BitField.name: VECTPENDING
BitField.description: Indicates the exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

BitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
BitField.description: Controls whether the processor uses sleep or deep sleep as its low power mode

BitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
BitField.description: Indicates sleep-on-exit when returning from Handler mode to Thread mode

BitField.name: STKALIGN
BitField.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

Register.name: SHCSR
Register.description: System Handler Control and State Register
